title: The cave complex of Kvakhvreli
about: The cave complex of Kvakhvreli is located in Shida Kartli region, Gori Municipality, in the east of the village of Kvakhvreli, on the opposite side of the fortress-town Uplistsikhe, on the right bank of the river Mtkvari. The monument dates back to VII-IX centuries. In ancient times, it was the agricultural suburb of Uplistsikhe.
